definition: to depend on/to hang on in a place/bad/to renege (on promise)/to disclaim/to rat (on debts)/rascally/to blame/to put the blame on

sentences.english: If you try to walk away from the mortgage, the bank will come after your personal assets.
sentences.chinese: 如果有人試圖賴賬，銀行便會查封他的個人資產。

sentences.english: And even threating something like that is the height of irresponsibility.
sentences.chinese: 我們不能賴賬，就連以此作爲威脅都是不負責任之尤。

sentences.english: A yoga instructor looks to protect her sex-worker sister from her deadbeat boyfriend.
sentences.chinese: 一個瑜伽教練看起來保護工作者從她姐姐賴賬的男友。

sentences.english: Agate is a dead beat and no one in our class wants to lend him any money.
sentences.chinese: 艾格特是一個借錢賴賬的人，我們班沒人想借給他錢。
